channel.title: Blog on Sungho Spark
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Sungho Spark

item.title: Helm 2 to 3 Migration Review
item.description: My first project at Calm was migrating Helm2 to Helm3. In this post, I’m going to share a few resources I used as guidance and more detailed steps and minor problems I ran into during the migration process. Recommended Read Summary of the changes from Helm 2 to Helm 3 How to migrate from Helm v2 to Helm v3 Migrating to Helm 3: What You Need to Know Migration Scenario at Calm At Calm, we have multiple k8s clusters throughout the environment.

item.title: Wrappingup 2020
item.description: 2020 has been a wild year. Started very strong with Hawaii trip, Wim Hof Method classes, and clear lake trip; then everything got super wonky with covid-19. One of the ignorant moment for me was at the beginning, I was naive enough to be think I’m glad no one can’t shut down the ocean, at least I’ll get to surf I suppose. and they freaking did shut down the beach access.
